original_title: Sleazy Does It with Sally Mullins
overview: As seen on Lights Out With David Spade, Sally Mullins presents an hour of live stand-up from Hollywood. This female comedian has been at The Comedy Store for 20 years but the crowds she cracked up did not know her secret - PORN is her side hustle! Laugh and learn more about granny porn than you may want to know. Tight jokes and a hot dress, Sally doesn't hold back in Sleazy Does It.
title: Sleazy Does It with Sally Mullins
